column4: what linux distibution is the UBUNTU distro functional with [debian/fedoera/redhat, etc.] ?

you know for ex. i want to install a program for example flash player, there is no listing for a download for UBUNTU, only for redhat, suse, debian, and other more known linux distos. which one should i download, since there is none for UBUNTU distro?
the ones for suse, redhat, or fedora can't work right?
